timelineData.title: Freelancer game developer
timelineData.description: I worked, in team with a group of friends, to develop mobile games in the Unity game engine.

timelineData.title: iOS Developer Apprentice
timelineData.description: I attended the Apple Developer Academy in Napoli, where i learned how to concive, wireframe, design and develop native mobile apps. During this period I worked on four different projects, together with my peers at the Academy.

timelineData.title: Full stack developer
timelineData.description: I started working as full-time developer in 2020. I was working on a project in the maritime field called SeaStream, a web application designed for naval companies with the purpose of tracking their ships across the world and to monitor in real time all the data recieved from the sensor available on those ships.

timelineData.title: Full stack developer
timelineData.description: I'm currently working remotely for CodicePlastico as full-stack developer. My role here is to help other companies to design and develop IT services for their necessities. Currently i'm working for a company in the energy field, developing a web portal for the end user to monitor data coming from IoT devices installed all over the country.

projects.title: everportal
description: In a universe once peaceful and happy, strange portals start to appear. Otherwordly creatures are invading our reality, spreading evil all around.
It's the duty of the keepers of the Everportals to restore peace! Harness the power of the Everportals and send the creatures back to their homes
Everportal is available for iOS devices trough the Appstore. It was developed as a team project with the joined effort of my peers at the Apple Developer Academy.
Developed entirely with native frameworks and languages ​​(Swift, SpriteKit), it was positively evaluated by Apple mentors and officially presented at the Academy future fair 2019.
A remastered version is currently planned, rebuilt entirely on Unity and coming to Android and iOS

projects.title: galaxi
description: Galaxi helps you focus during your activities and lets you visualize your efforts. Help Pipo in his journey to colonize new planets  all around the galaxy and make them flourish. With your help Pipo will be able to find a new home for his specie.

projects.title: target stuff
description: It is a mobile game available on the Google Play Store.
Developed on the Unity game engine by a team of friends with the passion for gaming and development.
In this project I dealt with the implementation of the game logic and the main gameplay mechanics. I also contributed to the creation of graphic assets and sound effects.

projects.title: seastream
description: A collection of web applications with the purpose of monitoring marine traffic, improve vessels tracking and allow navigation companies to find in real time the status of their ships and on-board equipment.

I worked on this project with my collegues in SyncLab from 2020 to 2022, My main role was to redesign e develop the UI/UX of all the sub-apps of Seastream while also implementing some of the APIs and backend logic

projects.title: A2A Smartcity
description: A web applications with the purpose of monitoring IoT devices installed all around the country.
I worked on this project with my collegues in CodicePlastico as external resource for A2A, My main role was to develop new functionalities and services requested to my company.
